alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Coweta; Fayette; Henry (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 11:27PM EDT until March 27 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Fayette County in north central Georgia... Western Henry County in north central Georgia... Northeastern Coweta County in west central Georgia... Clayton County in north central Georgia... * Until 1215 AM EDT. * At 1127 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sharpsburg, or near Newnan, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newnan, Fayetteville, Jonesboro, Peachtree City, Stockbridge, Forest Park, Riverdale, Hampton, Tyrone, Morrow, Lovejoy, Senoia, Lake City, Sharpsburg, Turin, Woolsey, East Newnan, Lake Spivey, Rex and Starrs Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
